sec.p:
The plant materials and methods used (see hereafter) were available upon request. All data obtained have been included into the manuscript.
Data scope and type Database
Identification of chemical substance peaks National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST)-11-2013 ( http://www.nist.gov/srd/upload/NIST1a11Ver2-0Man.pdf)
Protocols of testing of antimicrobial activities by agar-diffusion method Clinical and Laboratory Standards Institute, USA ( http://ncipd.org/control/images/NCIPD_docs/CLSI_M100-S24.pdf)
Protocols for determination of antiradical activity International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry, Analytical Chemistry Division ( http://www.bashanfoundation.org/shela/shelaiupac.pdf)
